summary: An ordinance calling a special election for March 8, 1938; providing for the submission thereat of a proposition authorizing a tax levy at a rate three mills in excess of the rate specified in Initiative Measure No. 114 (Forty Mill Tax Limit); requiring the City Comptroller and ex-officio City Clerk to certify to the Election Board of King County, Washington, as required by law, said proposition in the form of a specified ballot title; and declaring an emergency.
